reviewText: I bought the VHS version but ... This package contained everything!  I was extremely pleased with what I received.  I didn't have to order one other video or music CD for my library.  There were four video's on massage therapy - including one on Baby Massage (which was absoultely great) and three relaxing CD's.  The music is so soothing, I keep them going all the time in the background whether I'm giving a massage or not.  It just keeps everyone's nervers calmer.  The video's are wonderful to refer back to and my friends are now asking to "borrow" them! <smile>  I recommend this set highly.

I bought this in the VHS format but thought I should give a review for those of you who do DVD - so here goes!  I was extremely pleased at the complete package I received for this price. It was well worth it. I would have expected to pay more (I'm glad I didn't have to!) All the music and instruction I needed for a total complete library is here. I highly recommend this superduper combo pack! Thanks everyone for putting it together.

I bought a few titles from this company only before I saw this offering.  I was very pleased with the instuctional videos and the relaxation CDs.

If only I would have seen this sooner, I could have gotten all thier products at a great price.
